recipe.name: Chipotle Hummus
recipe.ingredients: 2 cans (425 grams, 15 oz per can) chickpeas, drained 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 cup olive oil 2 tablespoons lime juice 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon onion powder 1/2 teaspoon chipotle powder 1/2 teaspoon dry epazote 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

step.describe: Put the chickpeas in the mixing bowl. 40 seconds, starting at 5 speed and slowly increasing to 8 speed.
Scrape down the bowl. 40 seconds, starting at 5 speed and slowly increasing to 8 speed.
Scrape down the bowl. Add the salt, olive oil, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, chipotle powder, epazote, and Dijon mustard.
40 seconds, starting at 5 speed and slowly increasing to 8 speed.
Scrape down the bowl and taste for seasoning. Add more salt or spices if desired. If the mix isn't as smooth as you prefer, blend again.
Serve with torn flour tortillas or pita bread, pita chips, or crudit√©.
